recipesJson.name: The Count
recipesJson.author: coop34
recipesJson.description:
If using TFA sweetener then go 1%

FLV MC is by far the best that I have used. I had written chocolate vapes off, but I have been having success with this one. This is more of a milk at the bottom of the bowl of Count Chocula, or maybe Coco-Crispies cereal. This may be my only recipe where I consider sweetener to be a must.

Ok after a week, of course 2 week steep is better.

reviews.text: A fantastic chocolate cereal mix. Really show cases how good Flv Milk Chocolate is. Tastes just like the milk left over in the bowl.

Great recipe and definitely deserving of the best recipe of December award. Tastes just like the bowl of milk a super chocolatey cereal leaves behind. And everyone knows, that's the best part! Very well done, sir!
This is the first chocolate recipe I really enjoyed, it's really great. Be sure to steep the full 2 weeks.
Love it, great work. Will mix it again. Need that two week steep though.
